name: Diaboromon
effect: [When Attacking] You may play 1 [Diaboromon] Token without paying its memory cost. (Diaboromon Tokens are level 6 white Digimon with a memory cost of 14， 3000 DP， and are Mega form， Unidentified type， and Unknown attribute.)[All Turns] When this Digimon would be deleted in battle， you may delete one of your other [Diaboromon] to prevent this Digimon from being deleted.
